end of exams...life is good again!

31 May 2005

Wow,

no more exams. Now I just have to ace an honours project to do well. Luckily we all have a week off to reflect on our lack of revision and our ineptness at bowling!

Here's a picture of us discussing the finer points to bowling to an average of 90 (again..I'm on the left):
